entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
